```{r Z score with moving X,echo = F,comment = NA}
x = seq(0,10)
saveGIF_simple(for (moving_x in seq(-3.5,3.5,0.2)) {
  x = seq(-3.5,3.5,0.1)
  y = dnorm(x,mean = 0,sd = 1)
  plot2_data_in_loop = as.data.frame(cbind(x, y))
  text = paste0('$\\Z =  \\frac{',round_simple(moving_x,2),' -  0}{1}$ = ', moving_x)
  plot_ = plot2_data_in_loop %>% 
    ggplot(data =.,aes(x = x,y = y)) + 
    geom_line() + 
    geom_line(data = data.frame(x = c(moving_x,moving_x), y = c(0,0.4)),color = 'red') + 
    labs(title = 'Relationship between Z score & Normal Distribution',
         y = 'Frequency') + 
    theme_classic() + 
    annotate(geom = 'text',x = -2.5, y = 0.45, label = latex2exp::TeX(text)) + 
    lims(y = c(0,0.5))
      
  print(plot(plot_))},
  movie_name = 'Plot3_moving_X.gif', 
  clone_repository_path = clone_repository_path,
  loop_speed = 0.4, loop_number = 1)
```


```{r Z score with changing sd,echo = F,comment = NA}
fix_X = 1.5
x = seq(0,10)
saveGIF_simple(loop_object = for (sd in seq(1,5,0.2)) {
  x = seq(-7,7,0.1)
  y = dnorm(x,mean = 0,sd = sd)
  plot2_data_in_loop = as.data.frame(cbind(x, y))
  text = paste0('$\\Z =  \\frac{',fix_X,' -  0}{',sd,'}$ = ',round_simple(fix_X/sd,2))
  plot_ = plot2_data_in_loop %>% 
    ggplot(data =.,aes(x = x,y = y)) + 
    geom_line() + 
    geom_line(data = data.frame(x = c(fix_X,fix_X), y = c(0,0.4)),color = 'red') + 
    labs(title = 'Relationship between Z score & Normal Distribution',
         y = 'Frequency') + 
    theme_classic() + 
    annotate(geom = 'text',x = -4.5, y = 0.45, label = latex2exp::TeX(text)) + 
    lims(y = c(0,0.5))
      
  print(plot(plot_))},
  movie_name = 'Plot3_moving_sd.gif', 
  clone_repository_path = clone_repository_path,
  loop_speed = 0.4, loop_number = 1)
```
